name: Whithore
culture_notes: Coastal Tongues dialect with Island Creole loanwords
diet centered on smoked fish, kelp, fermented shellfish
annual tide-blessing rites and knotwork craft tradition
constraints: ritual magic requires scarce imported reagents
no instant resurrection or true life-replacement magics
notes: population unknown; transient crews and reagent runners common
narrow harbor prone to siltation and seasonal closure
